description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Rayo Vallecano vs Espanyol in the Spanish La Liga
title: Rayo Vallecano vs Espanyol: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head
title_page: Rayo Vallecano vs Espanyol: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Attempt saved. Adri Embarba (Rayo Vallecano) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Isi Palazón.
Post
Fourth official has announced 6 minutes of added time.
Goal!
Goal! Rayo Vallecano 0, Espanyol 4. Pere Milla (Espanyol) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Álvaro Aguado following a fast break.
Post
Attempt missed. Marash Kumbulla (Espanyol) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Álvaro Aguado following a set piece situation.
Post
Attempt missed. Javi Puado (Espanyol) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Edu Expósito with a through ball following a fast break.
